price: Or do the people of the towns feel secure that Our punishment will not befall them by day while they are at play?
arabic: أَوَأَمِنَ أَهۡلُ ٱلۡقُرَىٰٓ أَن يَأۡتِيَهُم بَأۡسُنَا ضُحٗى وَهُمۡ يَلۡعَبُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
